plot: Musical satire based on Anthony Hope's Ruritanian novel "The Prisoner of Zenda" in which a commoner takes the place of a lookalike king.
title: The Prisoner of Swing
plot_es: Musical satire based on Anthony Hope's Ruritanian novel "The Prisoner of Zenda" in which a commoner takes the place of a lookalike king.
plot_en: Musical satire based on Anthony Hope's Ruritanian novel "The Prisoner of Zenda" in which a commoner takes the place of a lookalike king.

cast.role: Rudolph, King of Sulvania /              Mr. Razzenstill
cast.name: Hal Le Roy
